search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Eventbrite (eventbrite.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Eventbrite can be found at: [https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/pricing](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Eventbrite Pricing and Features for Organizers | Eventbrite

extracted_content.content:
Publish events for free on the world's largest events marketplace
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Our pricing is simple—publish your events for free, and attendees pay low cost Ticketing Fees only on paid tickets.

Your #1 partner in event success

We put event management on auto-pilot, so you can focus on creating unforgettable experiences

![Image 1](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2025/rebrand/organizer/pricing/a--pricing-img--001.png)

Eventbrite’s powerful discovery marketplace connects local ticket-buyers to your events. And, with our built-in marketing suite powered by exclusive event data, you can effectively promote your events without leaving Eventbrite.

Visibility on Eventbrite’s marketplace

Eventbrite Ads\*

Email campaigns

Facebook and Instagram ad tools

Promo codes

Smart audiences

Data insights and reporting

![Image 2](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2025/rebrand/organizer/pricing/a--pricing-img--002.png)

Our best-in-class ticketing tools make it easy to set up your events and get paid fast. With flexible payment options and streamlined checkout, your attendees can buy with confidence.

Custom pages and multiple ticket types

AI event creation

Secure payment processing

Pre-event payouts

Embedded checkout

Custom registration forms

Sell add-ons

![Image 3](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2025/rebrand/organizer/pricing/a--pricing-img--003.png)

Make event day and beyond a breeze with on-the-go check-in tools and attendee marketing automations, so your event shines from start to finish, plus event support when you need it.

Automated event reminders

Organizer app

Mobile check-in

Waitlists

Help center

Email support

24/7 chat support for paid events

\*Eventbrite Ads is only available in select markets. Ad spend for advertising tools not included.

Meet the rising demand

With improved personalization, it’s now easier than ever for people to find and buy tickets to events they’ll love through Eventbrite’s marketplace

93M

unique ticket buyers on Eventbrite in 2023

2x

the consumer reach of our closest competitor

No upfront fees

Free for you, low fees for attendees on paid tickets

Our pricing is simple

No fees for free events

3.7% + $1.79 service fee per ticket

2.9% payment processing fee per order

Fees are paid by ticket buyers on paid tickets, unless you choose to cover them.

[Find out more about how fees work](https://www.eventbrite.com/help/en-us/articles/755615/)

Optional add-ons

Send more emails

Save on marketing costs with Eventbrite Pro and send up to 10,000 emails daily. Starting at $15/month

Eventbrite Ads

Increase your event's visibility with sponsored placements on top spots across Eventbrite

Hosting large events?

Grow your events with our expert team by your side

![Image 4](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2025/rebrand/organizer/pricing/High+Five.svg)

Unlock winning strategies with a Strategic Advisor

![Image 5](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2025/rebrand/organizer/pricing/Tickets.svg)

Expand your reach with exclusive Eventbrite-sponsored marketing

![Image 6](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2025/rebrand/organizer/pricing/Chat.svg)

Get priority access to phone and 24/7 chat support

Hear what our organizers are saying

"For people coming to our event outside of San Francisco, nearly 70% of our attendees say they found it on Eventbrite."

"The conversion rate on Eventbrite was 20% better than other ticketing platforms...plus the automated emails generate a lot of new sales each time we post a new event."

"We rely on Eventbrite for its discoverability and we're gaining followers. I can't think of an event where it wouldn't make sense to be using Eventbrite's marketing tools."

### Partner with Eventbrite

[Get started](https://www.eventbrite.com/creator/onboarding/onboarding-redirect)

Eventbrite

eTix

See Tickets

Dice

Universe

Consumer audience reach1

90M

20M

15M

10M

5M

AI-powered tools

![Image 7: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CheckIcon.svg)

![Image 8: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 9: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 10: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 11: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

Email and social media ad tools with smart audiences

![Image 12: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CheckIcon.svg)

![Image 13: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 14: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 15: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 16: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

Advertise to ticket buyers on the platform

![Image 17: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CheckIcon.svg)

![Image 18: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 19: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 20: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 21: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

Self-service + Create an event in seconds

![Image 22: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CheckIcon.svg)

![Image 23: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 24: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 25: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

![Image 26: Check Icon](https://eventbrite-s3.s3.amazonaws.com/marketing/landingpages/assets/2023/components/competitors-table/images/a-CrossIcon.svg)

[Get started](https://www.eventbrite.com/creator/onboarding/onboarding-redirect)

1\. Number of unique ticket buyers on Eventbrite in FY23; Other platforms scaled using Similarweb’s global web and mobile traffic and internal assumptions of traffic to ticket buyers ratio

What’s included when I use Eventbrite?
--------------------------------------

When you host with Eventbrite, your event is featured on the world's largest and most trusted events marketplace, where millions of global ticket buyers discover things to do.

You’ll have access to our complete toolkit, including integrated event ticketing, AI-powered event setup, secure payment processing, and powerful social media and email marketing tools—all designed to help you create a stand-out event. Learn more about our features [here.](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/overview)

Is it free to use Eventbrite?
-----------------------------

Yes, publishing your event on Eventbrite is free! Your attendees pay Ticketing Fees including a service fee and payment processing fee where applicable, unless you choose to cover them. If your event is free, no Ticketing Fees apply. Learn more about our Ticketing Fees [here.](https://www.eventbrite.com/help/en-us/articles/755615/how-much-does-it-cost-for-organizers-to-use-eventbrite/)

There is an additional cost associated with running Eventbrite Ads or launching Instagram and Facebook ads through Eventbrite.

Do you offer special pricing for nonprofits?
--------------------------------------------

Yes, we offer discounted Ticketing Fees on [donation tickets](https://www.eventbrite.com/help/en-us/articles/460357/how-to-fundraise-and-collect-donations-with-eventbrite/) , so more funds go directly to your cause. Additionally, qualifying nonprofits get [50% off our Pro plans](https://www.eventbrite.com/l/email-marketing/) so you can save on sending more marketing emails with Eventbrite.

We’re committed to supporting nonprofits with tailored features to help you and your community thrive. Learn more [here](https://www.eventbrite.com/l/npo/) and discover how Eventbrite can empower your mission.

What if my event is free?
-------------------------

If your event is free, there are no fees to publish on Eventbrite and no Ticketing Fees for your attendees.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What support do I get with Eventbrite?
--------------------------------------

Finally, if you’re hosting large events, you can [contact our sales team](https://www.eventbrite.com/l/contact-eventbrite-sales/) for dedicated phone support and strategic advising to help you maximize our platform.

What is Eventbrite Pro?
-----------------------

Eventbrite Pro is a subscription add-on that offers extra daily email sends with our powerful marketing tool. [Learn more here.](https://www.eventbrite.com/l/email-marketing/)

Find the package that's right for you. From all the essentials         you need to start selling tickets to tailored features for large event organizers,         we have something to meet your needs.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Eventbrite charges no fees for free events. Paid events incur a service fee and payment processing fee.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Subscription add-on for enhanced email marketing.

promotional_offers.offer_description: 50% off Pro plans for qualifying nonprofits.

additional_fees.fee_description: Cost associated with running Eventbrite Ads or launching Instagram and Facebook ads through Eventbrite.

What’s included when I use Eventbrite?
--------------------------------------

When you host with Eventbrite, your event is featured on the world's largest and most trusted events marketplace, where millions of global ticket buyers discover things to do.

You’ll have access to our complete toolkit, including integrated event ticketing, AI-powered event setup, secure payment processing, and powerful social media and email marketing tools—all designed to help you create a stand-out event. Learn more about our features [here.](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/overview)

Is it free to use Eventbrite?
-----------------------------

Yes, publishing your event on Eventbrite is free! Your attendees pay Ticketing Fees including a service fee and payment processing fee where applicable, unless you choose to cover them. If your event is free, no Ticketing Fees apply. Learn more about our Ticketing Fees [here.](https://www.eventbrite.com/help/en-us/articles/755615/how-much-does-it-cost-for-organizers-to-use-eventbrite/)

There is an additional cost associated with running Eventbrite Ads or launching Instagram and Facebook ads through Eventbrite.

Do you offer special pricing for nonprofits?

We’re committed to supporting nonprofits with tailored features to help you and your community thrive. Learn more [here](https://www.eventbrite.com/l/npo/) and discover how Eventbrite can empower your mission.

What if my event is free?
-------------------------

If your event is free, there are no fees to publish on Eventbrite and no Ticketing Fees for your attendees.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What support do I get with Eventbrite?

Finally, if you’re hosting large events, you can [contact our sales team](https://www.eventbrite.com/l/contact-eventbrite-sales/) for dedicated phone support and strategic advising to help you maximize our platform.

-----------------------

Find the package that's right for you. From all the essentials         you need to start selling tickets to tailored features for large event organizers,         we have something to meet your needs.
